lead_paragraph: David Johnson is a dream for those who play fantasy football — a big, fast, agile running back and an outstanding receiver who scores a lot of touchdowns.

headline.print_headline: Cardinals' David Johnson Has Tools to Be 'One of the Best'
headline.main: Cardinals' David Johnson Has Tools to Be 'One of the Best'
